See @fig-firstplot for first ggplot graph


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
mtcars %>% 
  as_tibble() %>% 
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = mpg, y = disp))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth()+
  labs(x = 'Miles Per Gallon (mpg)',
       y = 'Displacement in Cubic Inches (disp)')
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![Scatter plot and line plot of the relation between `mpg` and `disp`](foundations_files/figure-html/fig-firstplot-1.png){#fig-firstplot width=672}
:::
:::
